I will always recommend CS:GO, though it has a huge cheater problem.
I find myself using ESEA if I want a good competitive experience, since literally 3 out of 4 of every games I play have cheaters.
And I really don't know what the heck happened to my trust factor T_T

PS : Broken Fang is incredible and you should play it
